summary: With this mod you can summon 2 Moose … (No DLC required)
descriptionHtml:
With this mod you can summon 2 Moose … (No DLC required)

[url=https://www.casimages.com/img.php?i=18072103503616616015815831.jpg][img]https://nsm09.casimages.com/img/2018/07/21//18072103503616616015815831.jpg[/img][/url]

[b][color=#ff0000]SUMMONABLE MOUNTS[/color][/b]



To have the SUMMONABLE Mounts, you must buy the “Spell tome: XXX Moose”, at [b]Farengar Secret-Fire in Dragonsreach[/b] (Whiterun) or with an other "Spell Vendor" (ex: Sybille Stentor in the Blue Palace in Solitude)

With the book, you have the spell (Duration of the summon: 1 hour) ...

You can easily DISMISS when you want ! with an other "Spell Tome: Dismiss Summoned Moose"

In order to buy the 3 books at Farengar, [b][i]you must place this mod at the bottom of the list when you launch the game[/i][/b]

If problem with the mount you can try a fast travel


[b][i]Presentation of this mod (XBOX version)[/i]:[/b]

->->->->->->->->->->->->->->[youtube]egVOBDKKUf0[/youtube]<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-


[b][color=#ff0000]BUGS or PROBLEMS[/color][/b]


If the Moose disappeared when you are riding on it (with impossibility to dismount!) ...

3 solutions to make the creature reappear:

1) Unzoom using the mouse wheel of the mouse
2) Fast travel
3) Enter / leave a house (but you have to be descended from the beast though !!!)




[b][color=#ff0000]CREDITS[/color][/b]

Mihail Romanov for the Moose in [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/89527] Moose -Elements of Skyrim pt.9 (mihail immersive add-ons- megafauna- animals) [/url] (« Feel free to use my mod in your projects,no need to ask me for permission first »)
author: gg77
